result.eng: Do you come here often?

result.eng: She is often complaining.
result.ga: Bíonn sí ag gearán go minic

result.html: Bíonn sí ag gearán go minicShe is often complaining.
result.ponchtml: Bíonn sí ag gearán go minicShe is often complaining.

result.eng: How often do you see her?
result.ga: Cá mhinice a fheiceann tú í

result.html: Cá mhinice a fheiceann tú íHow often do you see her?
result.ponchtml: Cá ṁinice a ḟeiceann tú íHow often do you see her?

result.eng: How often does he come?
result.ga: Cé chomh minic is a thagann sé
result.orig: Cé chomh minic is a thagann sé
result.html: Cé chomh minic is a thagann séHow often does he come?
result.ponchtml: Cé ċoṁ minic is a ṫagann séHow often does he come?

result.eng: I used it often.
result.ga: D'úsáid mé go minic é
result.orig: D'úsáid mé go minic é
result.html: D'úsáid mé go minic éI used it often.
result.ponchtml: D'úsáid mé go minic éI used it often.

result.eng: I don't do it often, anyway.
result.ga: Ní dhéanaim go minic é cibé ar bith
result.orig: Ní dhéanaim go minic é cibé ar bith
result.html: Ní dhéanaim go minic é cibé ar bithI don't do it often, anyway.
result.ponchtml: Ní ḋéanaim go minic é cibé ar biṫI don't do it often, anyway.

result.eng: We don't often see wild animals.
result.ga: Ní minic a bhíonn deis againn ainmhithe fiáine a fheiceáil
result.orig: Ní minic a bhíonn deis againn ainmhithe fiáine a fheiceáil
result.html: Ní minic a bhíonn deis againn ainmhithe fiáine a fheiceáilWe don't often see wild animals.
result.ponchtml: Ní minic a ḃíonn deis againn ainṁiṫe fiáine a ḟeiceáilWe don't often see wild animals.

result.eng: I don't write letters often.
result.ga: Ní scríobhaim litreacha go minic
result.orig: Ní scríobhaim litreacha go minic
result.html: Ní scríobhaim litreacha go minicI don't write letters often.
result.ponchtml: Ní scríoḃaim litreaċa go minicI don't write letters often.

result.eng: That's something you don't see often, a girl who drinks beer.
result.ga: Sin rud nach bhfeictear go minic cailín a ólann beoir
result.orig: Sin rud nach bhfeictear go minic cailín a ólann beoir
result.html: Sin rud nach bhfeictear go minic cailín a ólann beoirThat's something you don't see often, a girl who drinks beer.
result.ponchtml: Sin rud naċ ḃfeictear go minic cailín a ólann beoirThat's something you don't see often, a girl who drinks beer.

result.eng: It depends on how often the songs are played.
result.ga: Tá sé ag brath ar a mhinice a chastar na hamhráin
result.orig: Tá sé ag brath ar a mhinice a chastar na hamhráin
result.html: Tá sé ag brath ar a mhinice a chastar na hamhráinIt depends on how often the songs are played.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé ag braṫ ar a ṁinice a ċastar na haṁráinIt depends on how often the songs are played.

result.eng: What do you do in Galway? You go in often.
result.ga: Céard a dhéanann tú i nGaillimh Bíonn tú ag dul isteach go minic
result.orig: Céard a dhéanann tú i nGaillimh Bíonn tú ag dul isteach go minic

result.ponchtml: Céard a ḋéanann tú i nGailliṁ Bíonn tú ag dul isteaċ go minicWhat do you do in Galway? You go in often.

result.eng: Well, often I watch cartoons on the television.
result.ga: Bhuel breathnaím ar chartúin ar an teilifís go minic
result.orig: Bhuel breathnaím ar chartúin ar an teilifís go minic
result.html: Bhuel breathnaím ar chartúin ar an teilifís go minicWell, often I watch cartoons on the television.
result.ponchtml: Ḃuel breaṫnaím ar ċartúin ar an teilifís go minicWell, often I watch cartoons on the television.

result.eng: There are a couple of pubs there, and there are often music sessions on at the weekend.
result.ga: Tá cúpla teach tábhairne ann agus bíonn seisiúin cheoil ar siúl ag an deireadh seachtaine
result.orig: Tá cúpla teach tábhairne ann agus bíonn seisiúin cheoil ar siúl ag an deireadh seachtaine

result.ponchtml: Tá cúpla teaċ táḃairne ann agus bíonn seisiúin ċeoil ar siúl ag an deireaḋ seaċtaineThere are a couple of pubs there, and there are often music sessions on at the weekend.

result.eng: I see my father often.

result.eng: Often, we rent a video and watch it Saturday night.

result.eng: How often do you go to plays? - Very seldom.

result.eng: That doesn't happen as often now as it used to a few years ago.
result.ga: Ní thiteann sin amach chomh minic anois agus a thitfeadh blianta beaga ó shin
result.orig: Ní thiteann sin amach chomh minic anois agus a thitfeadh blianta beaga ó shin

result.eng: They would often be in mortal danger.
result.ga: Bhíodh siad faoi bhagairt an bháis go minic

result.html: Bhíodh siad faoi bhagairt an bháis go minicThey would often be in mortal danger.

result.eng: I remember that I often used to say to people...
result.ga: Is cuimhin liom go n-abraínn le daoine go minic
result.orig: Is cuimhin liom go n-abraínn le daoine go minic
result.html: Is cuimhin liom go n-abraínn le daoine go minicI remember that I often used to say to people...
result.ponchtml: Is cuiṁin liom go n-abraínn le daoine go minicI remember that I often used to say to people...

result.eng: Also, what bloggers often got in response to their opinions was abuse from anonymous people.
result.ga: Ba mhinic fosta gur maslaí ó dhaoine le hainmneacha cleite a bhíodh mar thoradh ar na tuairimí a nocht blagadóirí
result.orig: Ba mhinic fosta gur maslaí ó dhaoine le hainmneacha cleite a bhíodh mar thoradh ar na tuairimí a nocht blagadóirí
result.html: Ba mhinic fosta gur maslaí ó dhaoine le hainmneacha cleite a bhíodh mar thoradh ar na tuairimí a nocht blagadóiríAlso, what bloggers often got in response to their opinions was abuse from anonymous people.
result.ponchtml: Ba ṁinic fosta gur maslaí ó ḋaoine le hainmneaċa cleite a ḃíoḋ mar ṫoraḋ ar na tuairimí a noċt blagadóiríAlso, what bloggers often got in response to their opinions was abuse from anonymous people.

result.eng: They would often sit, the two of them, on the bank of the sea.
result.ga: Is minic a shuíodh siad ina mbeirt ar bhruach na farraige
result.orig: Is minic a shuíodh siad ina mbeirt ar bhruach na farraige
result.html: Is minic a shuíodh siad ina mbeirt ar bhruach na farraigeThey would often sit, the two of them, on the bank of the sea.
result.ponchtml: Is minic a ẛuíoḋ siad ina mbeirt ar ḃruaċ na farraigeThey would often sit, the two of them, on the bank of the sea.

result.eng: I often heard my father talking about you.
result.ga: Is minic a chuala mé m'athair ag scéalaíocht ort

result.html: Is minic a chuala mé m'athair ag scéalaíocht ortI often heard my father talking about you.
